price: Mi s neba spuštamo vodu kao blagoslov i činimo da, uz pomoć njenu, niču vrtovi i žito koje se ženje,
arabic: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wanazzalnā mina al-samāi māan mubārakan fa-anbatnā bihi jannātin waḥabba al-ḥaṣīdi
